member.name: IUIAnimationVariableIntegerChangeHandler2.OnIntegerValueChanged
member.summary: Handles events that occur when the integer value of an animation variable changes in the specified dimension.
member.param: The storyboard that is animating the animation variable specified by the variable parameter.
The animation variable that has been updated.

param.name: newValue
param.para: The new integer value of the animation variable.
param.div: Note The rounding mode for an animation variable is specified using the method.

param.name: previousValue
param.para: The previous integer value of the animation variable.
param.div: Note The rounding mode for an animation variable is specified using the method.

member.param: The dimension in which the integer value of the animation variable changed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariableIntegerChangeHandler2
member.summary: Defines a method for handling animation variable update events. IUIAnimationVariableIntegerChangeHandler2 handles events that occur in a specified dimension.
